nodes.text: Ramordian silk was a form of fabric worn during the early years of the Galactic Empire. Trever Flume offered to sell a cloak made of this material to Obi-Wan Kenobi to replace his tattered Jedi robes saying he would look good in it. The fabric turned out to have been stolen from Mariana's Exquisite Designs and Alterations just before. A Ramordian silk cloak was also worn by the Neimoidian Separatist General Lok Durd
Sheets made out of Ramordian silk were found in the Grand Moff Disra's quarters on Bastion by Captain Zothip and his gang of Cavrilhu Pirates.
